io.apptik.rhub

Interface RSHub<P extends org.reactivestreams.Publisher>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.apptik.rhub.RHub<P>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRSHub

    public interface RSHub<P extends org.reactivestreams.Publisher>
extends io.apptik.rhub.RHub<P>
    Reactive Hub compatible with Reactive Streams Publisher Interface. This Hub accepts and returns Publisher as upstream sources and merged outputs.

    This interface overrides addUpstream(Object, Publisher) and removeUpstream(Object, Publisher) in order to remove type parameters as the Hub does not care of the input Sources as lon as they are compatible with the Reactive Streams Publisher interface.

    Implementations however can override RHub.getPub(Object) and RHub.getPub(Object, Class) to return specific implementations of the Publisher interface depending on the Reactive Framework used.
